meanings.sent1: The package was marked undeliverable because the address was wrong.
meanings.sent2: The undeliverable letter was returned to the sender.
meanings.sent3: The undeliverable pizza was a disappointment for the hungry customer.
meanings.sent4: Her promises of undeliverable success left her feeling defeated.
meanings.sent5: The undeliverable news of the canceled flight ruined their vacation plans.

meanings.sent1: The undeliverable parcel was sent back to the sender.
meanings.sent2: The undeliverable message bounced back to the sender's inbox.
meanings.sent3: The undeliverable invitation caused confusion among the guests.
meanings.sent4: His undeliverable promises of wealth led to disappointment.
meanings.sent5: The undeliverable package remained unclaimed at the post office.

meanings.sent1: The undeliverable goods were returned to the warehouse.
meanings.sent2: The undeliverable order was canceled by the customer.
meanings.sent3: The undeliverable message was lost in cyberspace.
meanings.sent4: Her undeliverable excuses for being late were not convincing.
meanings.sent5: The undeliverable promise of a quick fix left him skeptical.
